title: Dauntless - Arcslayer Pack
longDescription:
Harness the power of aetheric science with the Arcslayer Pack. Includes the following items:
-  5,400 Platinum
-  Arcslayer Cosmetic Armour Set
     -  Arcslayer Helmet
     -  Arcslayer Gauntlets
     -  Arcslayer Jacket
     -  Arcslayer Greaves
-  Arcslayer Torch Lantern Skin
-  Arcslayer Flagstaff
-  “Arcslayer” Title
-  Arcslayer Shield Banner Fabric
-  Arcslayer Cipher Flare
-  Arcslayer Cipher Sigil
-  100 Ace Chips
-  3 Rare Cells
-  1 Epic Cell

Platinum is an in-game currency that can be used to purchase weapon and armour skins, arrival emotes, banner customizations, and more. You can also use it to upgrade your Hunt Pass.
